CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(Motif_de_R_siliation__c, 'M3')), 'Code M', IF((ISPICKVAL(Motif_de_R_siliation__c, 'M6')), 'Code M', IF((ISPICKVAL(Motif_de_R_siliation__c, 'M10')), 'Code M', IF((ISPICKVAL(Motif_de_R_siliation__c, 'Code X')), 'Code X', '') ) ) )
